config.title: Patient Information
config.name: page3
config.content: Tell us about your interaction with patients.

config.name: firstName
config.label: Average number of patients you see a day.
config.helpText: This does not have to be exact.  Estimation is acceptable.

config.name: middleName
config.label: Most patients you've seen during a single day, over the last month.
config.helpText: This does not have to be exact.  Estimation is acceptable.

config.name: lastName
config.label: How long do you spend, on average, with each patient.
config.helpText: This does not have to be exact.  Estimation is acceptable.
